amendment.description: Amendment requires that there be a net gain in the number of law enforcement officers who perform nonadministrative public safety services by local government units if such units receive funds under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that there will be a net gain in the number of law enforcement officers who perform nonadministrative public safety services by local government units if such units receive funds under the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
